event.title: Mali Tiler Bus

event.description: Number of read data beats (128-bit) from the L2 cache

event.name: Tiler bus writes

event.title: Mali Tiler Cycles
event.name: Tiler loading descriptors

event.name: Position shading wait
event.description: Number of cycles waiting for position shading

event.name: Position shading stall
event.description: Number of cycles stalled on IDVS interface requesting position shading

event.name: Position FIFO full
event.description: Number of cycles the L2 FIFO is full and blocking position shading requests

event.title: Mali Tiler Prefetch
event.name: Tiler stall
event.description: Number of cycles the prefetcher has valid data but is stalled by the vertex fetcher

event.name: VCache hit
event.description: Number of Vertex Cache hits

event.name: VCache miss
event.description: Number of Vertex Cache misses

event.name: VFetch wait positions
event.description: Number of cycles spent reading in positions

event.name: VFetch wait vertex
event.description: Number of cycles waiting for a valid vertex in the vertex fetcher

event.name: VFetch stall
event.description: Number of cycles the vertex fetcher has valid output data but is stalled

event.title: Mali Textures (Messages)
event.name: Request Messages
event.description: Number of texture request messages received.

event.title: Mali Textures (Passes)
event.name: Received
event.description: The number of passes received by the descriptor fetcher.

event.title: Mali Textures (Passes)
event.name: Received with Cache Miss
event.description: The number of the passes received by the descriptor fetcher that encountered a cache miss in the Texture Descriptor Cache or the Sampler Descriptor Cache.

event.title: Mali Textures (Passes)
event.name: Processed with Mip Maps
event.description: The number of passes processed by the descriptor fetcher that have mip-maps enabled.

event.title: Mali Textures (Passes)
event.name: Passes Split
event.description: The number of pass splits due to accessing multiple mip-map levels.

event.title: Mali Textures (Fetch)
event.name: Lines Fetched
event.description: The number of cache-lines fetched in total.

event.title: Mali Textures (Fetch)
event.name: Lines Fetched from Block-Compressed Textures
event.description: The number of cache-lines fetched from block-compressed textures in memory.

event.title: Mali Textures (Fetch)
event.name: Texel Fetch Operations
event.description: The number of operations executed in the texel fetcher hit path.

event.title: Mali Textures (Filter)
event.name: Filter Operations
event.description: The number of operations executed in the primary filtering unit.

event.name: Writes out
